channel.title: Uhnevents on CUPE Hospitals
channel.description: Recent content in Uhnevents on CUPE Hospitals

item.title: UHN Information Sessions October 11 & 12, 2017
item.description: Coffee and light snacks will be served. UHN Employees October 11: 10am-4pm Jimmy’s Coffee at 84 Gerrard Street UHN Western Hospital Employees October 12: 10am-4pm Tim Hortons at 750 Dundas Street West Ask us your questions what is a union and what do unions do? why did the employer send me a letter about unionization? what are my rights in the workplace? how can I get involved?

item.title: University Health Network Drop-ins August 30, Sept 6, 13
item.description: Coffee and light snacks will be served. When: August 30 September 6 September 13 Time: 10:00 am – 2:00 pm (drop in anytime) Location: Jimmy’s Coffee (3 rd floor) - 84 Gerrard Street West (north side of Gerrard between Elizabeth and Bay) Ask us… Do you have questions? what is a union and what do unions do? why did the employer send me a letter about unionization?
